required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Forensic Dental Age Estimation : Validation of Computed Tomography for Third Molar Demirjian's Staging
clinical_study.official_title: Forensic Dental Age Estimation : Validation of Computed Tomography for Third Mandibular Molar Demirjian's Staging Method in a 0- 25 Years French Living Population

brief_summary.textblock:
Age can be estimated in different ways by using skeletal age and dental age. Currently, bone age is determine thanks to the wrist x-rayed, and the dental age using variation in mineralization (Demirjian's score) on the dental panoramic (Mincer 1993).
More recently, reviews indicate the Computed tomography (CT) scan of the medial clavicular epiphysics can contribute to improve the accuracy of individual's age estimation (Houpert, 2016).
Furthermore, with the recent advances, the very low dose CT scan acquisitions can be perform with sufficient quality for the teeth analysis.
The goal of this study is to validate the use of dental CT for Demirjdian's staging method.

primary_outcome.measure: weighted Kappa test between CT scan
primary_outcome.description: weighted Kappa test between CT scan and dental panoramic assessment of Demirjian's staging of third mandibular molar

secondary_outcome.description: Mineralization difference between mandibular and maxillar third molar

secondary_outcome.measure: Dental age estimation in a south french population
secondary_outcome.description: Dental age estimation in a south french population

study_pop.textblock: Patient aged between 0 and 25 years old

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Patient aged between 0 and 25 years old
- Complete dental panoramic
- CT scan including mandible and maxilla
- Maximum of 2 months between CT scan and dental panoramic
- Medical imaging available on the PACS
Exclusion criteria:
- Medical imaging missing on the PACS
- Patient refuses to participate
